GameItemType.Description: Boots made from molded leather. They provide the barest of foot protection.
A cuirass made from molded leather. It will provide the wearer with minor protection from all types of damage.
A cuirass made from molded leather. It will provide the wearer with minor protection from all types of damage.
A cuirass made from molded and hardened leather. The hardened leather feels reinforced by magical means, providing the resistance of metal even though it is lighter than normal leather.
Leather greaves provide some protection while still remaining supple enough to keep from impairing movement.
A helm made from molded leather. While it will only protect you from the lightest of blows, it will make you look stylish.
This simple leather helmet is adorned with magical glyphs to help ward off enemy spells. It will not, however, provide additional protection from more conventional blows.
Armlets made from molded leather. They may not protect you from much, but something is always better than nothing.

These are also called Swordmaster's Gloves. The truth is that their magic doesn't come from training or expertise, but from the deadly proficiency of the Naja whose spirit is still embodied within them.
Boots constructed from interlaced metal rings designed to provide additional protection from cutting blows.
These otherwise ordinary chain mail boots have been enchanted to help shield the wearer from lightning.
A shirt constructed from interlaced metal rings designed to provide additional protection from cutting blows.
This chainmail shirt's links are hardened beyond normal metal. There is a light glow to it providing it with an almost ethereal quality.
The links of this chain shirt are interspersed with the unmistakable glow of crystal.
This chain mail shirt has been reinforced with additional braces and padding for improved protection.
Leg greaves constructed from interlaced metal rings designed to provide additional protection from cutting blows.
The interlocked chain links of this coif provide protection from cutting weapons but this is still a far cry from an actual plate helmet.
This chain coif has been imbued with mystical glyphs to help shield its bearer from enemy spells.
The aura of protective energy emanating from this otherwise ordinary chain coif seems to be the work of a skilled enchanter.
These armlets, constructed from interlaced metal rings, are designed to provide additional protection from cutting blows.
These scale gauntlets heighten the spellcasting power of the wearer.
The intricate pattern is clearly the work of a master armorsmith and serves to strengthen the armor.
This chain shirt was meticulously crafted by a master armorsmith. The fine craftsmanship has led to a lighter fit while actually providing improved protection.
The intricate pattern is clearly the work of a master armorsmith and serves to strengthen the armor.
The complex interlaying of chain links on this coif are clearly the efforts of a master armorsmith and have resulted in a more resilient helmet.
The chain links of this pair of armlets have been woven together in a pattern that reinforces their strength. It is clearly the work of a master armorsmith.
A triangular shield fashioned from flattened steel. It provides the wearer with a greater range of protection than a standard round shield.
This shield has been constructed out of fire-resistant dragon scales. A skilled wielder will be more resilient against flames.
This shield has been through many wars.
The surface of this mirror reflects the enemy's attack, and the enchantment reflects the damage.

GameModifier.Provides: Reflects 25% of the damage back at the attacker

GameItemType.Description: The metal of this shield is inlaid with obsidian. As a result it has become more adept at deflecting magical spells.
This shield has been magically etched with the image of a Phoenix by a master enchanter. It shimmers with magical energy and wards the user against all forms of damage.
This kite shield has been padded and enchanted to help protect the wearer from lightning.

GameModifier.Provides: Static Blast- When you are struck lightning strikes a random enemy for 4 Lightning damage (+1 per level)

GameItemType.Description: An ordinary steel kite shield that has had a series of enchantments placed on it to ward off enemy spells.
Boots made from forged steel and intricately designed to provide additional protection while actually using lighter metals. The design is ancient; a relic of a long lost civilization.
These boots have been carefully crafted by a master armorsmith. The delicate carvings on them belie their true purpose, to provide the utmost protection.

GameModifier.Provides: +1 Dodge vs Ranged Attacks per Level

GameItemType.Description: These boots are made of enchanted steel bound with crystals from an air elemental's staff. They not only protect wearers from lightning, but also make them light on their feet.
These boots are made of layered plates of refined steel. There is no more comprehensive (or heavy) style of leg protection available.
It nicely compliments your bloodstains and bruises.
A cuirass made from forged steel and intricately designed to provide additional protection. The design is ancient, a relic of a long-lost civilization.
A holdover from the arenas of Capitar, before Tarth led the revolt. What was once a mark of enslavement is now worn proudly by Tarth champions.
This plate cuirass is clearly the work of a master armorsmith. Its plates have been layered to provide it with additional resistance to impact.
This plate breastplate glows with a pale white light. The enchantment makes it stronger than steel but nearly as light as leather.
There is an unmistakably magical shine to this breastplate. Its metal has been enchanted to improve its strength. You would be hard-pressed to find a more protective chest plate.
A heavy breastplate made from layered plates of forged steel. No other style of armor provides greater protection.
All the weight of plate armor with none of the benefits.
Sometimes more is better. This chest plate has been reinforced with additional padding and armor plate to protect the wearer beyond standard plate armor.
This armor feels like an exoskeleton for the wearer. The healing magic is so powerful that those that wear it once forever feel exposed and naked without it.
Greaves made from forged steel and intricately designed to provide additional protection while actually using lighter metals. The design is ancient, a relic of a long-lost civilization.
These greaves have been carefully crafted by a master armorsmith. The delicate carvings on them belie their true purpose, to provide the utmost protection.
These leg plates are made of layered plates of refined steel. There is no more comprehensive (or heavy) style of leg protection available.
It's hard to inspire a nation when you are wearing rusty shorts.
With these greaves the wearer can teleport between places in battle and, if the rumors are true, between worlds.

GameModifier.Provides: Thunderstrike- Allows the unit to teleport in tactical combat and do Lightning damage to all enemy units he teleports next to

GameItemType.Description: For ages the secrets of the finest helmets was thought to be lost to the world. Now they have been unearthed, bringing back a marvel of protection and efficiency.
It's amazing how master armorsmiths are able to get higher performance out of the same materials than an apprentice. This helmet stands as a testament to this fact.

This plate helm has been augmented with magically imbued Ivory. While it doesn't provide additional protection from standard blows, it does make the wearer feel lucky. It turns out luck is a valuable commodity when protecting your head.
A helm crafted from thick, durable plates of steel. It may be cumbersome but it should help protect from dangers such as falling rocks.
Well, it's better than nothing, but only barely.
The dull obsidian inlaid in this helmet seems to absorb the energy from the room. It was crafted by an expert to protect its wearer from harmful spells.
Forged from cold iron, the crown's barbs dig into the skin of the wearer - but there is no doubting that the pain is worth the power the crown offers.

GameModifier.Provides: Attacking this unit causes the attacker to lose their next attack unless they resist.

GameItemType.Description: The glyphs adorning this helm have been specifically laid out to ward its bearer from enemy spells.
A design of armlets from a time long forgotten. They are a marvel of efficiency, providing unrivaled protection while remaining lighter than similar armor.
The works of a master armorsmith are meticulously crafted to protect their wearers beyond the capability of normal armlets.
Standard armlets made of forged steel. While heavy, they will provide substantial protection for your forearms.
These arm guards combine defense and tetanus in one convenient package.
Originally given to the gate commanders of Grazna, a few sets of these enchanted gauntlets have survived.
These gauntlets imbue the wearer with the power of the stars.
These gauntlets have been smelted in the furnaces over the Pit of Sarpah. They are made from a steel alloy formed from the volcano walls causing them to be resistant to heat.
These bracers have been imbued with magical energies that will keep the wearer warm through the harshest cold.
Though the enchantment on these robes is faint they still help link the wearer to the arcane.
These robes combine a variety of enchantments that soften blows, turn enemy weapons aside and protect from even the sharpest blades.

The art of enchanting these robes has been lost, but at one time an archmage's last trial and proof of his proficiency in magic was the creation of his robes. This robe has the initials "E.G.G." sewn into the lining.
These robes billow and move even when there is no wind. When the wearer casts they whip out as the arcane energy is channeled through them and into the caster.
Queen Procipinee was taught to craft these robes as a girl, and because of her that knowledge has survived.
A standard shield, light and able to protect the head or the body - but not at the same time.
The steel wore away centuries ago, but the enchantment lingers on.

GameModifier.Provides: Ghost Touch- Anyone who strikes the wielder takes 1 damage

GameItemType.Description: This standard round shield has been adorned with magical glyphs to help ward the bearer from enemy spells.
The armies of Krax keep these shields so polished they flash and reflect the light, blinding attackers and confusing enemies.
A round shield that has been magically enchanted to radiate heat into its wearer. It helps ward off the biting cold.
Forged in the furious maelstroms carried on the western winds, this shield has been enchanted to help its bearer to weather any storm.
It's good for at least one more battle.
Tower shields provide unrivaled protection and body coverage. They are quite cumbersome, however, requiring a sure hand and strong back to wield.
The protection this shield offers does not come from enchantment, but from layers of iron. It was not intended to be wielded by men, but by the tireless Gilden Iron Golems.
This tower shield is made of a near-impenetrable steel alloy blended with refined crystal. It is unrivaled in its ability to shrug off the mightiest of blows.
This shield has been embossed with shards of obsidian that seem to deaden magic in an area around the wearer.
The unmistakable glow of magic hangs about this tower shield. A powerful alchemist clearly aided in its construction, weaving strengthening spells into its base materials.
A tower shield carefully made by a master armorsmith. The care in its crafting is apparent through both its intricate inscriptions and its improved durability.

GameModifier.Provides: Sentinel- This units Defense is increased by 1 each time they are attacked.

GameItemType.Description: The simplest of shields, nothing more than a chunk of wood fashioned into a rudimentary blocker. Every little bit of protection helps, just be wary of splinters.
